instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> cpu gets hot no chime
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> was not turning on, the owner used a faulty charger.  I replaced DC-in board because  and now it turn on but doesn't chime. eps id

CPU gets hot
usb has 5v
it beeps if ram are not present

Could be a corrupter bios or a faulty SMC damaged from faulty charger?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> cpu gets hot no chime
threads.message: BIOS is a good suspect to start, but damaged CPU is also possible. Swap BIOS for testing then ME region needs to be fixed.
